invertedMouseButton: tawa pi ilo luka li jasima
mouseSensitivitySlider: wawa tawa pi ilo luka li
maxFPS: mute ken pi tenpo sitelen li
maxFPSUnlimited: mute ken pi tenpo sitelen li ale
debugCrashButton: ijo pi jan ilo: o pakala e musi
preAlphaText:
o kama pona tawa musi Cosmic Reach! 
 musi ni li sin mute. pali pi musi ni li pini ala. 
 ken suli la pakala mute li lon, kin la ma sina li ken kama pakala.
 ijo ale li ken kama ante, li pana ala e sona lon ijo pi musi ni pini. 
 jan pali li pana e musi tan ni: sina ken alasa e pakala, li ken toki e ijo wile sina pi tenpo kama.  
 o musi pona... o pakala pona kin!
worldSeedLabel: nanpa namako la ilo li pana
Open_Worlds_Directory: o lukin e poki pi musi awen
YT_Channel: o lukin e pali pi musi ni lon youtube.com/@finalforeach
Game_version: nasin pi musi Cosmic Reach ni li nasin pi sin mute nanpa
MAC_warning: O SONA: ilo Mac li pona ala tawa musi ni lon tenpo ni. ken suli la musi li pakala.
Controller_info:
li lon!
ken pi ilo ni li wile e pali,
li kama pona lon tenpo kama.
Screenshot_error: mi ken ala awen e sitelen.
RuntimeException: mi ken ala open e ma
OddTip5: mi tawa poki jaki e selo moli...
OddTip6: mi jo e kili jan pi ken ale...
OddTip7: mi kama jo e insa pana "pi jan wile"...
OddTip8: mi lukin e monsuta pi lawa tu wan...
OddTip10: mi kipisi e ijo lon kule ona...
OddTip11: sona: sina ken ala utala e kama ante pi ijo ale.
